tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
Doctor Krishna was very well behaved and patient. I went there for my kid teeth issue and he was very supportive.
He handled the issue very well and assured of services in future in case some issue is there.
The clinic was well cleaned and sanitization and other things were well taken care of.
The doctor comes on time and does not hurry.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Krishna Mohan is an expert and inspite of that he is very down to earth and humble. After examination, he explains the problem and the necessary treatment in layman's language. he keeps in mind high costs associated with dental problems and offers free follow up everytime and as much discount as possible.A great dental expert in Horamavu for everyone!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: 3 months back I visited doctor due to toothache. he checked and suggested root canal treatment. I did root canal plus ceramic crown. since the doctor is very experienced the treatment was completely painless and perfect. I would recommend this doctor for any dental problem and there really appreciate his work.
